Key Match Events: Pathum Nissanka hit an undefeated 77, his fourth successive fifty at the tournament
Ben Stokes (43) took the attack to Sri Lanka on a dry wicket
Jos Buttler won the toss and opted to bat
Jonny Bairstow (30) survived an lbw chance
Kumara struck twice to leave England in tatters at 85-5
Post-Match Reflections: England have lost four matches at the ICC Cricket World Cup 2023
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sri Lanka restricted England to 156 all out in 33.2 overs
Sri Lanka chased just 157 to win in the match on Thursday, reaching 160-2 with 146 balls to spare
Sri Lanka's victory ensures the lowest all-out total in Bengaluru
